text: Have you installed Prettier? The style guide can help you do this: Linting
Do these variable names make it easier to understand what the code should do, or harder? The style guide explains this idea in more detail: Naming things
When I run this function, I get `undefined`. Should it return something?
This function is very long. Can you break it up into smaller functions?
When I run the tests, I get an error. Can you see why?
This code works, but I'm not sure it meets the requirements. Can you check?
This code seems to have a lot of repeated lines. Can you think of a way to make it more DRY?
Great job! I'm not sure what to suggest, but I'm sure you can find something to improve.
I understand now why this code is necessary. Can you add some comments to explain why you've written it like this?
